16 ALKERMES •  CORPORATE RESPONSIBILITY REPORT • ENVIRONMENT
2020 Energy Performance Data 
In 2020, the electricity at 
our Athlone, Ireland site was 
certified by Captured Carbon 
of Ireland as being sourced 
from 100% renewable 
electricity. This achievement 
underscores our commitment 
to reducing our environmental 
impact and implementing 
sustainable business practices.
